sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ClothesService} from "../services/clothes/clothes.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { clothes: String[] = []; constructor(private clothesService: ClothesService){ } ngOnInit(): void{ this.clothes = this.clothesService.getAll(); } }
